episodes.synopsis: This episode raises questions about the purpose of the pyramids, challenging the story traditional Egyptology tells.
episodes.title: The Band of Peace

episodes.synopsis: Evidence that the ancient Egyptians used high-level technology to construct pyramids and temples is shown.
episodes.title: High Level Technology

episodes.synopsis: Deciphering the meaning of strange symbols in Egyptian art gives insight into the ancients' knowledge of sacred cosmology.
episodes.title: Sacred Cosmology

episodes.synopsis: The Empowered Human proposes that the pyramid builders were living in a Golden Age, which gave them superior abilities.
episodes.title: The Empowered Human

episodes.synopsis: Carefully considering cycles of time through Plato's Great Year, a new chronology is emerging that illuminates ancient Egypt.
episodes.title: A New Chronology

video.title: The Pyramid Code
video.synopsis: How was the scientific understanding of the ancients so advanced? A team of experts answers this and other questions in this fascinating series.
